  2. Netflix quietly removes popular feature, frustrating subscribers  Yahoo Finance
  3. Netflix Won't Let You Cast Shows From Your Phone to Most TVs Anymore  WIRED
  4. Netflix quietly drops support for casting to most TVs  Ars Technica
  5. Netflix just killed one of its most convenient features  AL.com

item.title: Guitar amp sims have gotten astonishingly good - Ars Technica
item.description:
1. Guitar amp sims have gotten astonishingly good  Ars Technica
  2. “Gives you the keys to a studio full of classic tube amps, speaker cabs, stompboxes, and effects”: Universal Audio’s amp-emulating pedals have been a huge success – now they’ve arrived in plugin form via the all-inclusive Paradise Guitar Studio  Guitar World
  3. “We built Paradise to make any guitarist feel like they’re playing in a dream studio": Universal Audio releases Paradise Guitar Studio – and it's 25% off for Cyber Monday  MusicRadar
  4. UA Introduces Paradise Guitar Studio  Premier Guitar
  5. Universal Audio releases Paradise Guitar Studio plugin  Mixdown Magazine
